inventoryItem.itemDescription: An energy weapon forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

steps.nodeStepDescription: This weapon causes Void Damage.
This weapon causes Solar Damage.
This weapon causes Arc Damage.

Snapshot sight. 
Excellent handling.
Superb target acquisition.

Flexible sight. 
Light, with good recoil control.
Strong target acquisition.

Agile sight. 
For smooth engagement in close quarters.
Increases magazine size.

These iridium-core rounds overpenetrate targets.
Their mass slows down weapon handling.
When held, this weapon grants +2 character Agility.
Increases Attack Power, allowing this weapon to cause more damage.
Melee kills increase the reload speed of this weapon for a short time.
Kills with this weapon reduce the cooldown of your grenade.
Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.
A kill with the final round in the magazine increases reload speed.
Slide further while this weapon is equipped.
On spawn, this weapon occasionally gains additional ammo.
This weapon has bonus accuracy while firing from the hip.
Kills with this weapon grant bonus reserve ammo.
Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.
Increases the pick-up radius of ammo drops for this weapon.
Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.

Stable sight. 
Optimized for excellent recoil control.

Agile sight. 
Lightning-fast handling.

Accurized sight. 
For precise fire.

Flexible sight. 
Enhances handling, range, and recoil control.

Standard sight.
A lightweight design, good for recoil control.

Snapshot sight. 
Enhanced target acquisition.

Precision sight. 
Highest zoom in class. 
Enhanced range.
This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
Reload this weapon even faster.
Switch weapons faster. Move quicker while aiming.
